name: Psycho Stolen
description:
(title tentative)

In a near future, a cataclysmic event sent humanity back to a pre-industrial age.  All around you are fragments of the past, but is there any reason to rediscover the past when nobody seems to be able to remember more than 24 hours at a time?

Woah!

...Is what I would put as the hook for this story, however all I have is a little tech demo of my RPG inspired by Paper Mario, Dragon Quest, and Chrono Trigger with cool little mushroom guys

Features:

  • Positional battle system, no battle is the same!
  • Timed inputs during attacks, boost your power by hitting the right prompts!
  • Unique equipable items that do more than just boost stats!
  • Smooth and easy to use inventory!
